title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Angela Towers, 20, Edinburgh South, retail worker, British Home Stores,route of transmission undisclosed. Andrew Tremenco, 21, Edinburgh North, BA business studies studentat Heriot-Watt University, intravenous drug use. Norman Vincente, 45, Edinburgh South, wine bar proprietor, father ofthree, unprotected sexual contact with intravenous drug user.
